lines.content: * Aegis is a task management chatbot that supports adding managing, and
* listing tasks. It also allows marking tasks as done or undone, deleting tasks,
* Enum representing the types of commands supported by the application.
LIST, MARK, UNMARK, DELETE, BYE, TODO, DEADLINE, EVENT
private static ArrayList<Task> tasks = new ArrayList<>();
* Prints out the text formatted with the boundary lines for users.
* @param msg the text to be printed out
* Prints out a formatted line whenever a user adds an item to the list.
* @param task The task that was added.
printBorders("Got it. I've added this task:\n" + task + "\nNow you have " + tasks.size() + " tasks in the list.");
* Determines the type of command based on the user's input
* @param  input The input string entered by the user.
* @throws CommandException If the command is invalid or unrecognized.
private static CommandType determineCommandType(String input) throws CommandException {
* Based on the CommandType, the input will be handled differently.
* This method returns a boolean flag which indicates if the system
* should get out of the loop and quit.
* @param  ct The type of command to be executed.
* @param  input The input string associated with the command.
* @return True if the program should exit, false otherwise.
* @throws TaskInputException If the command input is invalid or incomplete.
private static boolean handleCommand(CommandType ct, String input) throws TaskInputException {

if(tasks.isEmpty()) throw new TaskInputException("No task available to mark!");
printBorders("Nice! I've marked this task as done:\n" + task);
if(inputArray.length == 1) throw new TaskInputException("You did not specify which task to unmark!");
if(tasks.isEmpty()) throw new TaskInputException("No task available to unmark!");
printBorders("OK, I've marked this task as not done yet:\n" + task);
if(inputArray.length == 1) throw new TaskInputException("You did not specify which task to delete!");
if(tasks.isEmpty()) throw new TaskInputException("No task available to delete!");
printBorders("Noted. I've removed this task:\n" + task + "\nNow you have " + tasks.size() + " tasks in the list.");

// Printing the logo and welcome message

* A base exception class for the Aegis chatbot.
* All custom exceptions in the Aegis chatbot extend this class.
* Constructs an AegisException with the specified error message.
* An exception class for handling invalid commands in the Aegis chatbot.
* This is a specific type of {@link AegisException}.
* Constructs a CommandException with the specified error message.
* Provides a user-friendly error message for invalid commands.
* @return A string representation of the exception with additional context.
* An exception class for handling invalid or incomplete task inputs in the Aegis chatbot.
* This is a specific type of {@link AegisException}.
* Constructs a TaskInputException with the specified error message.
* Provides a user-friendly error message for invalid task inputs.
* @return A string representation of the exception with additional context.
* Represents a deadline task in the Aegis chatbot.
* A deadline task has a task name and a due date (by).
* Constructs a Deadline object with the specified task name and due date.
* @param taskName The name or description of the task.
* @param by The due date or deadline for the task.
* @throws TaskInputException If the task name or due date is invalid.
public Deadline(String taskName, String by) throws TaskInputException {
* Returns the string representation of the deadline task.
* The format includes the task type, task name, and the due date.
* @return A string representation of the deadline task.
* Represents an event task in the Aegis chatbot.
* An event task has a task name, a start time (from), and an end time (to).
* Constructs an Event object with the specified task name, start time, and end time.
* @param taskName The name or description of the event.
* @param from The start time of the event.
* @param to The end time of the event.
* @throws TaskInputException If the task name, start time, or end time is invalid.
public Event(String taskName, String from, String to) throws TaskInputException {
* Returns the string representation of the event task.
* The format includes the task type, task name, start time, and end time.
* @return A string representation of the event task.
* Represents a generic task in the Aegis chatbot.
* A task has a name and a completion status, which can be marked as done or undone.
* Constructs a Task object with the specified task name.
* The task is initially marked as not complete.
* @param taskName The name or description of the task.
* @throws TaskInputException If the task name is empty.
throw new TaskInputException("Task name cannot be empty");
* Gets the status icon for the task.
* An "X" indicates the task is complete, and a blank space indicates it is not complete.
* @return The status icon ("X" for complete, " " for not complete).
* Marks the task as done, setting its completion status to true.
* Marks the task as undone, setting its completion status to false.
* Returns the string representation of the task.
* The format includes the status icon and the task name.
* @return A string representation of the task.
* Represents a Todo task in the Aegis chatbot.
* A Todo task is a simple task that does not have a deadline or a specific time frame.
* Constructs a Todo task with the specified task name.
* @param taskName The name or description of the Todo task.
* @throws TaskInputException If the task name is empty.
* Returns the string representation of the Todo task.
* The format includes a "[T]" prefix followed by the task's status icon and name.
* @return A string representation of the Todo task.
